item.title: semolina pudding
item.description: January 26, 2003 SEMOLINA PUDDING Ingredients: 1 cup sugar 1 cup milk 4 cups water grated peel of 1 lemon (pref. organic) 1 cup semolina flour cinnamon raspberries or other berries Directions: Mix sugar, milk, water and lemon peel in a pot or big saucepan. Heat until just about to boil, then gradually sprinkle in semolina flour, whisking the whole time to prevent lumps from forming. Allow mixture to thicken considerably.
